Entries.Introduction: Ah, the new farmer we've all been expecting... and whose arrival has sparked many a conversation!#$b#I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottName}}... I live in the little cabin by the beach. It's a pleasure to meet you.
Entries.event_boat1: ... I was worried you might not feel this way about another {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Man:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottGender}}}}.$l^So am I.$l

Entries.OneKid_3: Caring for babies isn't exactly my strong suit... but I'll do my best to be a good {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Father:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottGender}}}}.
Entries.TwoKids_1: I was carrying %kid1 earlier, and I could've sworn I heard a "{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Da:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottGender}}}}...{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Da:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottGender}}}}".$h
Entries.fall_26: Would you still love me if I guzzled two gallons of pumpkin ale at the Spirit's Eve festival? Sometimes a {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Man:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottGender}}}} has primitive urges...
